Answer: A, B, C, D
The events that led to Ben Simmons' decline were the ongoing back problems, mental health issues, and the team's turmoil, which are described in event 11. This was compounded by renewed instability caused by Kyrie and Kevin Durant's requests to leave the team, as well as the fines associated with Simmons not being mentally ready to play. Finally, Simmons' previous All-Star recognition and defensive accolades with the 76ers also played a role in setting high expectations that he has failed to meet.
